data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garrison, Rosser W. (2014): Review of Oxystigma Selys with the synonymy of Oxystigma williamsoni Geijskes (Odonata: Heteragrionidae). Zootaxa 3780 (2): 347-364, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.2.7|87 occurrences
